name: Consecutive dry days
definitie: Numărul maxim de zile cu precipitații mai mici de 1 mm
defnition: Maximum annual number of consecutive dry days (when precipitation < 1.0 mm

name: Scorch no days
definitie: Număr de zile cu arșiță (Tmax. ≥ 32°C) de la 1 iunie la 31 august
defnition: Scorching heat number of days (Tmax. ≥ 32°C) from 1 June to 31 August

name: Growing Season Length
definitie: Numărul anual de zile între prima apariție a 6 zile consecutive cu Tmed > 5 °C și prima apariție a 6 zile consecutive cu Tmed < 5 °C
defnition: Annual number of days between the first occurrence of 6 consecutive days with TM > 5°C and the first occurrence of 6 consecutive days with TM < 5 °C

name: Heating Degree Days
defnition: Annual sum of TM - 22 (where 22 is a user-defined location-specific base temperature and TM > 22

name: Cooling Degree Days
defnition: Annual sum of 15.5 - TM (where 15.5 is a user-defined location-specific base temperature and TM < 15.5)

name: Number of very heavy rain days
definitie: Numărul anual de zile în care precipitațiile >= 20 mm
defnition: Annual number of days when precipitation >= 20 mm
